text: Bart & Josh from Fathom put some time on my calendar this am to discuss tech. They also added me to a Google doc, which I’ll share. I’ll add to your calendars now - Joel & Abby, it’d be great to have you there - everyone else is welcome but optional if other work precedes it.
I'll be there!
Also backed up the tech documentation Bart provided on the NAS
Carnival > Fathom > From Client > Tech Documentation
thanks, abby
<@U02618EV1>: if you have some time it would be great to have you take a look at that tech documentation, there's a lot there
Yes, was about to jump in there now.
Thanks.
awesome, thank you!
best hold music EVER
makes me wonder if it’s these guys: <http://postmodernjukebox.com>
It is PMJ! <https://www.uberconference.com/holdmusiccover>

attachments.title: UberConference - The Best Free Conference Call
attachments.text: UberConference provides a rich visual interface for conference calls. Simple, visual, and free to use, it's audio conferencing done right. Easily set up and join free conference calls, see who is in the conference, who is talking, and use powerful conferencing features.
attachments.fallback: UberConference: UberConference - The Best Free Conference Call

text: does anyone have a link to the current site?
<http://fathom.org|fathom.org>
<https://basecamp.com/1848688/projects/9590334>
<!channel> Just got a note from Bart asking if what Melissa is proposing (getting basic info+CC data upfront, then DOB, gender, etc later) will work with the POLAR system.
<@U02E3CRMA>: when you get a chance let's chat about this as that's what i was wondering right after our call - if all of the info they've listed is needed upfront to work with POLAR
i’m not necessarily proposing that ^^^
i’m sending a doc shortly with some thoughts
Thanks
ditto - finalizing notes in Basecamp now
<@U026103R3>: do you want me to post a note directly in basecamp?
<@U0260V1BX>: that’s where my notes are going - would make sense to keep it all together
yes please!
<@U026103R3> want me to check the email box? or do you want to manage comms with them?
oh yea feel free to check the box that sends it out to everyone
thanks for the writeup <@U0260V1BX>
it was great
thanks <@U0260V1BX>
np! hope its helpful to them. I really didn’t feel comfortable rushing design on such a critically important part of their site.
instead i’ll just spew platitudes and tell them what’s wrong with the current design :wink:
well I think <@U02E3CRMA>'s info and <@U0260V1BX>'s writeup are both super helpful, and should give them the details they need to be able to put together the wireframes
agree!
Sending a note to Bart on the contract. LMK what you guys think.
Draft in your mailboxes
looks good, not sure if you feel it's necessary to call out the Polar API documentation not being great but maybe we can discuss that on a call outside of contract negotiations
I’d rather imply that it was based on the API docs - I think we can get granular with where we see the limitations when we’re on a call w/ Josh.
yep makes sense
saw joel and showed him the note - just shipped
awesome
